entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Otherwise clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
